failed_checks.check_name: Ensure that the seccomp profile is set to docker/default or runtime/default
code_block:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: StatefulSet
metadata:
  name: n8n-main
  namespace: default
  labels:
    app: n8n-main
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: n8n-main
  serviceName: n8n-service
  replicas: 2
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: n8n-main
    spec:
      containers:
      - name: n8n
        image: REPLACE_IMAGE_WITH_ACR_PATH:TAG
        ports:
        - containerPort: 5678
        
        envFrom:
        - configMapRef:
            name: n8n-config-vars
        - secretRef:
            name: n8n-sensitive-secrets

        resources:
          requests:
            cpu: "250m"
            memory: "512Mi"
          limits:
            cpu: "1000m"
            memory: "1024Mi"
        
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /healthz
            port: 5678
          initialDelaySeconds: 15
          periodSeconds: 10
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /healthz
            port: 5678
          initialDelaySeconds: 10
          periodSeconds: 5

#workers
---

failed_checks.check_name: Ensure that the seccomp profile is set to docker/default or runtime/default
code_block:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: n8n-workers
  namespace: default
  labels:
    app: n8n-workers
spec:
  replicas: 3
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: n8n-workers
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: n8n-workers
    spec:
      containers:
      - name: n8n
        image: REPLACE_IMAGE_WITH_ACR_PATH:TAG
        ports:
        - containerPort: 5678
        
        envFrom:
        - configMapRef:
            name: n8n-config-vars
        - secretRef:
            name: n8n-sensitive-secrets
            
        env:
        - name: N8N_WORKER_PROCESS
          value: "true"
        - name: N8N_MAIN_PROCESS
          value: "false" 

        resources:
          requests:
            cpu: "250m"
            memory: "512Mi"
          limits:
            cpu: "1000m"
            memory: "1024Mi"
        
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /healthz
            port: 5678
          initialDelaySeconds: 15
          periodSeconds: 10
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /healthz
            port: 5678
          initialDelaySeconds: 10
          periodSeconds: 5

  replicas: 3
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: n8n-workers
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: n8n-workers
    spec:
      containers:
      - name: n8n
        image: REPLACE_IMAGE_WITH_ACR_PATH:TAG
        ports:
        - containerPort: 5678
        
        envFrom:
        - configMapRef:
            name: n8n-config-vars
        - secretRef:
            name: n8n-sensitive-secrets
            
        env:
        - name: N8N_WORKER_PROCESS
          value: "true"
        - name: N8N_MAIN_PROCESS
          value: "false" 

        resources:
          requests:
            cpu: "250m"
            memory: "512Mi"
          limits:
            cpu: "1000m"
            memory: "1024Mi"
        
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /healthz
            port: 5678
          initialDelaySeconds: 15
          periodSeconds: 10
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /healthz
            port: 5678
          initialDelaySeconds: 10
          periodSeconds: 5

apiVersion: v1
kind: ConfigMap
metadata:
  name: n8n-config-vars
  namespace: default 
data:
  EXECUTIONS_MODE: queue
  DB_TYPE: postgres
  DB_HOST: "pg-n8n-tf-server.postgres.database.azure.com" 
  DB_DATABASE: "n8n_db"
  DB_REDIS_HOST: "redis-n8n-tf-cache.redis.cache.windows.net" 
  DB_REDIS_PORT: "6380"
  QUEUE_BULL_REDIS_TLS: "true"
  N8N_HOST: "https://dghwgsebfbgxh5ev.fz78.alb.azure.com" 
  N8N_INTERNAL_HOST: "http://n8n-service:5678" 
  N8N_WORKER_CONCURRENCY: "5"
  N8N_WORKER_PROCESS: "true"
  N8N_MAIN_PROCESS: "true"
